#summary Introduction to ImageListView
#labels Phase-Design,Featured

= Introduction =

!ImageListView is a .NET control for displaying a list of image files. It looks and operates similar to the standard !ListView control. Image thumbnails are loaded asynchronously with a separate background thread. !ImageListView requires the .NET framework 2.0.

= Features =

  * Asynchronously loaded thumbnails
  * Customizable renderers
  * Drag&drop support
  * Details view: filename, type, size, path, dimensions, resolution, ...
  * Fast thumbnail extractor for embedded Exif thumbnails
  * Different view modes: Thumbnails, Gallery, Pane and Details.
